an5.163:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.163:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an5.163:2.1: “Pancahavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam sakaccho sabrahmacarinam.
an5.163:2.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu attana ca silasampanno hoti, silasampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.163:2.4: attana ca samadhisampanno hoti, samadhisampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.163:2.5: attana ca pannasampanno hoti, pannasampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.163:2.6: attana ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti;
an5.163:2.7: attana ca vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti, vimuttinanadassanasampadakathaya ca agatam panham byakatta hoti.
an5.163:2.8: Imehi kho, avuso, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam sakaccho sabrahmacarinan”ti.
